#Setup File

```{r, setup, include=FALSE}
#Change root directory
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = "/Users/liampurkey/Desktop/Research/Gentrification")
```

```{r}
#Load packages
library(magrittr)
library(readxl)
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(spData)
library(tmap)
library(purrr)
source("Code/Scripts/utils.R")
```

```{r}
#Read in tract shapefile
nyc_shp = st_read("RawData/Boundaries/NewYork.shp") %>%
  select(-tract_area) %>%
  st_transform(2263)
```

```{r}
#Read in parks shapefile
parks_shp = st_read("RawData/ARCHIVED\ -\ Parks\ Properties/geo_export_305578e7-67de-47cd-af84-f6770752baff.shp") %>%
  select(geometry) %>%
  st_transform(2263) %>%
  st_make_valid()
```

#Prepare Data

```{r}
#Create centroids
nyc_centroids = st_transform(st_centroid(nyc_shp), 2263)
```

#Clean Data

```{r}
park_counts = map_dfr(nyc_centroids$GEOID, aggregate_parks, tracts_shp = nyc_centroids, id_var = "GEOID", parks_shp = parks_shp)
```

#Write Data

```{r}
write_csv(park_counts, "CleanData/park_counts")
```
